external_references.description: Adamitis, D. et al. (2019, June 4). It's alive: Threat actors cobble together open-source pieces into monstrous Frankenstein campaign. Retrieved May 11, 2020.

description: During [Frankenstein](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0001), the threat actors used MSbuild to execute an actor-created file.(Citation: Talos Frankenstein June 2019)
